mario feedback

this is mario angst plus a visual post-processing layer, chroma key out most of the background, then apply video feedback loop (in OBS).





inspiration

techniques

  • simulate key/controller input (e.g. trigger a jump)
  • set parameters or trigger events based on game state values (e.g. Mario X position)
  • chroma keying
  • blending
  • add whatever original sound

tools

  • BizHawk
  • OBS
  • VCV Rack

devlogs

  • 2022-10-07
  • babycastles show 2022-12-03
